name: Tippy Tree: A Christmas Puzzle
description:
Master the art of decorating your Christmas tree without tipping it over. Small trees, big trees, wacky trees and more! Each and every one waiting for your careful placement and keen eye. With various levels of difficulty, the balancing act is sure to prove a fun challenge for all ages.

- Over 30 ornaments for you to collect and place
- Decorate different trees across 20 challenging levels
- See how many ornaments you can place in infinite mode
- Open the gifts under your tree and be rewarded
- Share pictures and videos of your trees with friends and family
- Compete for the high score on Game Center
